attributes.action: Confiscate all cars/vans that have not been taxed or insured for more than one month
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the government is serious about reducing congestion then get the 1.5 million cars off the road that are not taxed or insured.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
